name: NLQ Reports
description: NLQ from the database and generate the charts from the data using Gen AI

appStages.name: Introduction
Chart Generation
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

NLQ & Chart Generation

Overview

  • + An application leveraging Natural Language Query (NLQ) and Generative AI to generate charts from data. You can input queries in natural language to create visual data representations.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Actions

  • + Enable the checkbox to view the database schema.
  • + Choose your preferred LLM (Large Language Model) from the available options.
  • + Select a query from the provided sample options or write your own custom query.
  • + Once the query is ready, click the Submit button to process it.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "customClass": "m-3", "key": "html6", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 }, { "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Outputs

  • + The system will generate and display the SQL query corresponding to your input.
  • + It will automatically execute the query to retrieve the relevant data.
  • + Based on your query and the retrieved data, it will generate and present visual charts for better insights.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "customClass": "m-3", "key": "html7", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 } ], "key": "columns", "type": "columns", "input": false, "tableView": false, "keyModified": true }, { "label": "View Database Schema", "customClass": "m-3", "tableView": false, "defaultValue": false, "key": "viewDatabaseSchema", "type": "checkbox", "input": true }, { "label": "HTML", "className": "m-2", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Customer Table Schema

customer_id customer_name customer_group customer_address customer_email customer_phone
SERIAL PRIMARY KEY Name of the customer Group or category of the customer Address of the customer Email address of the customer Phone number of the customer
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html8", "conditional": { "show": true, "when": "viewDatabaseSchema", "eq": "true" }, "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "className": "m-2", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Product Table Schema

product_id product_name product_group product_price product_description product_stock
SERIAL PRIMARY KEY Name of the product Group or category of the product Price of the product Description of the product Stock quantity of the product
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html9", "conditional": { "show": true, "when": "viewDatabaseSchema", "eq": "true" }, "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Sales Table Schema

sale_id invoice_number order_number customer_id product_id sale_date quantity transaction_amount discount payment_term contract_period
SERIAL PRIMARY KEY Invoice number of the sale Order number associated with the sale ID of the customer involved in the sale ID of the product involved in the sale Date of the sale Quantity of products sold Total transaction amount Discount applied to the sale Payment terms for the sale Period of the contract, if applicable
